name: Love Is <Adjective>
description:
NOTE: The online version works best in fullscreen with a 16:9 aspect ratio!

Love Actually meets Mad Libs!

This is the story of Kate, a struggling talent agent in the big city. She's just been proposed to by her boyfriend when she meets someone new: Jack, a soulful guitarist with a lot of promise. But things quickly get out of hand as he starts falling for her! How will Kate deal with a new client, a new crush, and you filling in silly words? A -wrenching rom-com!

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2019. Did you know that I haven't successfully completed a single game jam yet? This one is no exception: I got about as far as Jack and Kate meeting for the first time.

This is my first time releasing a game for Mac and Linux, so let me know if there's anything wrong with those versions.
